Opinions about the fit are mixed, with some finding it great while others report issues with proportions. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable fit
items.body: Could not fit any cuter! Great style but comfortable for relaxing at parties and events coming upâ€”so festive! I am 5â€™1 and 195#, ordered size large. Had to only adjust the length because I want options to wear boots. Fits otherwise perfect. Read more

items.body: Beautiful dress! So satisfied. Truly great quality and design and fits true to size. I love it. Read more

items.author: A. Swarey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: I got this dress for my November baby sprinkle and I got so many compliments on it. The color and style were perfect for the theme and season. Very nice material and great quality. It was stretchy and comfortable. Iâ€™m 5â€™4, 215 lbs, and 9 months pregnant. Size Large fit me perfectly. Best part is Iâ€™ll be able to wear it when Iâ€™m not pregnant too. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi season successâ€¦
items.body: Loved this dress for a wildflower themed wedding, with the subtle velvet floral pattern. Well designed for figure flattering. Will wear for Christmas, too, with a dressy sweater, since the deep teal has the green undertone. As Princess Katherine showed when she wore her green teal velvet evening dress, itâ€™s really a show stopper. Read more
items.author: l. edwards

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfy Dress for Outdoor Wedding Guest
items.body: I wore this dress for an outdoor Fall renaissance/enchanted fairytale type wedding and received lots of compliments! The bride wanted women to match the theme by wearing deep purple or emerald green. This short sleeve option was great because it ended up being a little warmer than usual in October. The material is velvet and has a faint but pretty design on it and the top is stretchy. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 and about 135 lbs and ordered a large. I was a little worried it might be too big but it fit perfectly and the length was great. I deducted 1 star from the rating because the dress was a bit pricey for the style. Read more
items.author: VAL

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the same dress.
items.body: It did not look like the same dress as advertised. It looks so flattering on the model. It was not on me. Fit and proportions were off. Will be returning. Read more
items.author: ruth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size run small. Elegant Dress, Beautiful Fabric and Style
items.body: Very elegant, fabric weight is just right, fit is great! ( Iâ€™m post partum, so things arenâ€™t the best fit at the moment except for this dress!! ðŸ˜) If busty size up from what Amazon suggests to you in size. Iâ€™m 5â€™ 1â€ 122lbs and had to order a size Large to have it fit comfortably in chest. I ordered a M originally, but it was a too tight in bust and chest. Read more
items.author: Timothy Long

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Wine Red, Blue Green, Grey Blue, Army Green, Earthy Orange, Orange Red, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
